strings.v: Both the Completion and Exploration Rewards for each Act can be viewed here at any time.

Join an Alliance!
Combine forces with other Summoners and earn exclusive rewards.
The Alliance Treasury stores donated resources. Donate Gold, Battle Chips, or Loyalty, or convert Units to resources directly.

Nobody can withdraw directly from the Treasury. Officers and Leaders use these resources to pay the starting fee
for Alliance Quests.

ALLIANCE EVENTS are special events everyone in your Alliance can participate
in together!
Each event is different, so check the rules to learn how to earn points.
Help your fellow Alliance members to earn Loyalty! Loyalty may be used to purchase Alliance Crystals.
You can ask your Alliance for help when you run out of Energy or when one of your Champions is out of Stamina.
Ask your Alliance for help to recover some Energy!
Ask your Alliance for help speeding up your Champion's stamina recovery!
Tap this icon to ask for help.
Auto Fight has been unlocked! Tap the Auto Fight button to allow the A.I. to control your Champion during the fight.
You can turn Auto Fight off and on in pre-fight as well as during the fight.
This view displays enemy progress against your Alliance's defenders.
This enemy is affected by a powerful Linked Node! Back out of this fight and wait for an ally to destroy the source!
Full rewards are earned by meeting the exploration goals for each type.
Rewards must be claimed from the stash!
Fully explore the quest to earn the most possible points.
You got a BOOST! Boosts activate powerful, limited-time bonuses that apply to all of your Champions.
The Boosts you've collected are stored on the Inventory page. You can view your active Boosts on your Profile page.
Activate Boosts to temporarily strengthen your Champions and increase your rewards!

Your first Boost is free: bonus Summoner XP for 7 days!
Activate the Beginner Boost now!
These buff nodes strengthen enemies. Tap on the buff icon for more info.
To view Linked Node targeting, tap on the map icon to enable strategic buff view.
Head to the CRYSTALS screen to get your new CHAMPION!
You've opened a new CHAMPION SLOT for your team! You can use the UNITS you've won to go to the CRYSTALS screen to collect a new Champion!
You found a CATALYST! You can use CATALYSTS to RANK UP your Champions on the UPGRADE SCREEN!
These are Catalyst Fragments. Collect them to form new Catalysts! Head to the Catalyst Screen to check up on your progress.
The Catalyst screen shows how many Catalysts and Catalyst Fragments you have. If you have Catalysts you don't need, sell them for higher tier Catalyst Fragments!
BATTLE CHIPS may be used to purchase Versus Crystals or unlock new Arenas.

Each CHAMPION CLASS has ADVANTAGE over another.
This advantage gives a Champion
BONUS ATTACK POWER!
Come back to claim your free Daily and 4 Hour Crystals for a chance at consumables and new Champions!
If a quest is too difficult, try returning to earlier quests. If you explore all of the tiles in a quest, you'll earn EXPLORATION REWARDS!
Strengthen your resilience by improving attributes like Health, Armor, and Resistance in the Defense Mastery Tree.
Greetings, Summoner! You are under consideration to represent the Earth in a cosmic Contest of Champions against Kang the Conqueror.
I am The Collector, the organizer of this Contest.
The stakes are simple. Win and you shall be granted the secret to the untold power of ISO-8.
Lose and you shall be placed in my collection... permanently.
But first, you must prove your worthiness. I shall allow you to use my {0}. Kang has selected {0}.
Now... FIGHT!!!
Ah, a worthy performance! Congratulations, Summoner, you have been chosen to represent Earth. However, I’ll be taking my {0} back.
He’s in mint condition, and I do not want you decreasing his value.
Kang has visited my vault and collected another Champion. I suggest you do the same.

DRAG a CHAMPION to the TRAY
 to add them to your team!

Welcome to the EVENT QUESTS page!
From here you can participate in unique, limited time events.

EVENT QUESTS are a great place to find CATALYSTS to RANK UP your Champions,
so make sure to come here often!
BLOCK
Well done! You can mix MEDIUM and LIGHT ATTACKS to perform COMBOS!
DASH
DODGE
GO TO CRYSTALS
HEAVY ATTACK
PRESS and HOLD the RIGHT SIDE of the screen to charge a HEAVY ATTACK

Your opponent is BLOCKING!
 Break his block with a HEAVY ATTACK!
Now RELEASE!!
Best Played With Both Hands!
To win the Contest of Champions you must first master the basics of combat.
LIGHT ATTACK
TAP the RIGHT SIDE of the screen to do a LIGHT ATTACK
MEDIUM ATTACK
SWIPE RIGHT to do a MEDIUM ATTACK
ON LEFT
ON RIGHT
RELEASE!

You've saved enough power
 to use a SPECIAL ATTACK!

Now use everything you've learned
 in a REAL FIGHT!
SWIPE LEFT!
SWIPE RIGHT!
TAP!
PRESS + HOLD
If time runs out while you are fighting, a health penalty is applied to your Champion.

Use units to purchase Champion Crystals
 from the Collector's Vault!
{0} UNITS

DRAG the CRYSTAL
 to the PODIUM to open.

This is the Collector's CRYSTAL VAULT.
 Here you can purchase and open CRYSTALS containing CHAMPIONS.

Excellent! A formidable Champion has joined your collection!
 Now, open your bonus CRYSTAL.

Congratulations!
 Take your new Champions on a QUEST
 to defeat Kang's team!
BEGIN QUEST
TAP the EVENT QUESTS button to check out which events are currently running!

Your Champion is low on HEALTH. You can restore your Champion's health points with a HEALTH POTION!

(Health Potion added to Inventory)
This opponent has some of its information hidden. Start a fight to reveal its details!
SHOW ME
Now that you've upgraded your Champions, you're ready to take on Kang's team in the next Quest!
There is a limited number of consumables that can be used per Alliance Quest. Choose wisely!
You can also send gifts to Alliance members to help them out.

Leaderboards allow you to view where you stand against other Summoners!
Select a category and filter to see where you stand.
Log in daily to receive rewards. The more often you log in, the better the rewards!

You earned a MASTERY POINT!
Spend these points on Masteries to enhance your Champions.
You can access your MASTERIES page from your Summoner Profile.
This is your MASTERIES page. Spend your Mastery Points here to enhance your Champions with powerful new abilities!
This is a Global Node. This applies a buff to every boss in the quest. Destroy this boss to remove the buff!
This is a Linked Node. This applies a buff to linked bosses. Destroy this boss to remove the buff!
This is a Local Node. This applies a buff to the boss on this tile.
These icons indicate the source of a buff. Tap the icon in the quest for more information!
PORTALS DETECTED
Portals teleport summoners from one node on the map to another.
Tap the Portal Info button to learn more about portals.
Tap on "reposition" to center on your current position while exploring the Battlerealm.
To view all portal exits, or to learn more about portals, tap on the map icon for options.
The higher your Alliance's Prestige, the more difficult the quest, but you'll receive more points and better rewards for completing it.
Increase your Alliance's Prestige by improving your Hero Rating and winning quests.

Welcome to MULTIVERSE ARENA.
 From here, you can battle other players from all over the Multiverse!
You can drag your Champions to different slots to swap their matchups and improve your odds of winning the series.
SWIPE RIGHT TO DASH
SWIPE LEFT to DODGE

There are two techniques you can use
 to increase your mobility in combat: DODGE and DASH.

Well done! You can DODGE to AVOID enemy attacks and DASH to INITIATE
 an attack from a distance.
BEGIN FIGHT
Now, prepare to FIGHT!

GOLD is used to UPGRADE
 your Champions.

This is ISO-8. You can infuse ISO-8
 into a Champion to UPGRADE their LEVEL!

Congratulations on completing your
 first quest! You can use the ISO-8 you collected to upgrade your Champions.
The rewards for the current quest can be viewed here before you begin.
Tap any GREEN NODE on the Questboard to move forward!
GO TO UPGRADE

Collecting XP will raise
 your SUMMONER LEVEL.
Nice work! A Champion at MAX LEVEL can RANK UP! Ranking up your champions will greatly improve their stats.
To rank up a Champion you will need to find the specified CATALYSTS.
EVENT QUESTS are the best place to find CATALYSTS!

You found a {0}-STAR CHAMPION!!
Champions with higher STAR RATINGS have access to additional SPECIAL ATTACKS and SYNERGY BONUSES, and they are much more powerful overall!
(Revive Potion added to Inventory)

Your Champion is KNOCKED OUT!
You can get them fighting again with
a REVIVE POTION.
These are Crystal Shards. Collect them, and use them to get new special Crystals in the Crystal screen

The Shard Crystals screen is
where you can use your Crystal Shards
to get new special Crystals.

Collect duplicate champions from crystals to awaken and power-up that Champion's unique
SIGNATURE ABILITY!
SIGNATURE ABILITY AWAKENED
SOLO EVENTS have been added! Earn extra rewards by completing scheduled milestones and goals.
SOLO and ALLIANCE EVENTS are special challenges active for a set period time. Do well and earn Milestone and Rank Rewards!
SPECIAL ATTACK READY!
Each item has a different CAPACITY LIMIT. Items exceeding the limit are stored temporarily in the Stash. Check the Stash often!
Additionally, the ability to center on your current position while using portal strategic view on the map has been added.
A new map icon has been introduced, containing all strategic view options.
It includes: A new Portal Strategic View, that allows you to inspect all possible exits when portals are detected.
UPDATES!

Titles are a way to show off your achievements to other Summoners. Earn new titles by completing special content and goals! 

You can SELECT, ENABLE or DISABLE different titles.

Reroll Random Active Boosts!
For this event only, Modok will allow you to use his Boost Manipulator to take a chance and reroll enemy Boosts.
Will it work in your favor, or against you?

Reroll random active buffs!

For this event only, M.O.D.O.K. will allow you to use his Buff Randomizer to take a chance and reroll enemy buffs.

Will it work in your favor, or against you?

Excellent! Come back to this screen
 when you collect more ISO-8
 and want to UPGRADE your Champion!
Rank Up Gems increases the champion's rank by 1.

This is the MY CHAMPIONS screen.
 From here, you can UPGRADE, INSPECT, or SELL your collected CHAMPIONS!
Use ISO-8 to LEVEL-UP your Champion!
Welcome to the CRYSTAL VAULT. You can open CRYSTALS to gain powerful CHAMPIONS or useful ITEMS such as POTIONS or ISO-8!
Auto Fight has been unlocked! Tap the Auto Fight button to allow the A.I. to control your Champion during the fight.
You can turn Auto Fight off and on in pre-fight as well as during the fight.
BUFF NODES
TEST
Items on these nodes will only spawn once. After it is collected, you will not see this item again on the Questboard, even if you replay.
PERMANENT ITEMS DETECTED

This Champion has Persistent Charges that carry on from fight-to-fight within a Quest!
 Tap on the Abilities info icon to learn more about this Champion’s abilities.

This opponent has Persistent Charges that carry on from fight-to-fight within a Quest!
 Swipe Up in the window below to view this Champion’s Abilities information.
Gates
Destructible Gates

Gate detected in this quest!

Meet the Gate requirements to unlock the path. Destructible Gates remain permanently unlocked after navigating through them once.
GATE TYPES
Your new enemy has an ability called "Rally" which allows them to recover lost health by landing attacks. Rally decays over time.
6 STAR CHAMPION DETECTED
You found a 6-STAR CHAMPION! These Champions have a new ability called RALLY. This ability allows champions to recover lost health by landing attacks against the opponent. RALLY decays over time.
6 STAR CHAMPION
